member.name: T:Cyggie.Plugins.WebSocket.Models.Enums.WSReconnectionType
member.summary: Type of reconnection to apply when the websocket disconnects

member.name: F:Cyggie.Plugins.WebSocket.Models.Enums.WSReconnectionType.NoReconnect
member.summary: Does not reconnect at all

member.name: F:Cyggie.Plugins.WebSocket.Models.Enums.WSReconnectionType.ReconnectOnce
member.summary: Reconnects only once

member.name: F:Cyggie.Plugins.WebSocket.Models.Enums.WSReconnectionType.ReconnectConsistentDelay
member.summary: Reconnects until it is re-established with a consistent delay in between each reconnection attempt

member.name: F:Cyggie.Plugins.WebSocket.Models.Enums.WSReconnectionType.ReconnectIncrementalDelay
member.summary:
Reconnects until it is re-established with an incremental delay in between each reconnection attempt
Initial delay * (Number of reconnection attempted + 1) ^ 2
i.e. Initial delay = 5s
1st reconnection attempt = 5s
2nd reconnection attempt = 20s
3rd reconnection attempt = 45s
...

When type is , this value is incremented after every attempt
